## Ingredients

- Olive oil
- Â½ medium onion
- 2 cloves of garlic
- 1 smalll chicken
- 1 beer (33cl)
- 2 Tsp of "sopa de rabo de boi"

## Preparation

1. Cut onions and garlic
2. Fry them in a cacerolle with olive oil
3. Add the knorr and let the chicken fry a bit
4. Add the beer and let it cook for around 30min or until the chicken is tender
5. At the same time you can make rice or mashed potatoes
